title: AgroPredict – Smart Crop Advisor
goal: Predict optimal crop and fertilizer based on soil and weather conditions.
why_it_matters: Farmers lose yield due to unpredictable weather and poor input choices.
data: Soil data (NPK, pH), rainfall, temperature, crop yield datasets.
workflow: Predict best crop options and fertilizer suggestions.
outcome: Applied ML + agri-data fusion; highly demonstrable project.
